project_info_title: Premium Family Villas in Nad Al Sheba
project_info_text:
Nad El Sheba Gardens Phase 9 is an exclusive gated community by Meraas, offering a refined collection of 3 to 7-bedroom townhouses and villas in the prestigious Meydan district.

Designed for modern family living, the project blends contemporary architecture with lush landscaping, private gardens, pocket parks, and open green spaces. With seamless connectivity to Downtown Dubai and major highways, residents enjoy privacy, security, and effortless access to the cityâ€™s key destinations.
amenities_title: Amenities and spaces designed for refined living
project_summary_subtitle: Nature-inspired family living in central Dubai
map_text: Located in Nad Al Sheba 1, Meydan, the community offers direct access to Al Ain Road and Al Khail Road. Downtown Dubai and Burj Khalifa are approximately 10 minutes away, while Dubai International Airport is reachable within 15 minutes.
footer_tagline: Premium villas in Nad Al Sheba
